```{r}
install.packages("stargazer")
library(stargazer)

```

Formato Latex
```{r}
stargazer(iris)
```

Html
```{r}
stargazer(iris, type="html")
```


Texto
```{r}
stargazer(iris, type="text")
```

Salva em Disco
```{r}
stargazer(women, out="women.tex", summary=F)
```
